CIRCULAR 19  / 2000 
 
 
SUB : ENTRY TO THE AIRPORT 
 
 
 
In continuation of this Bureau Circular No. 14/2000 dated 15.05.2000 the following 
amendments are made with immediate effect. 
 
 
 
In para A (ii) of the said circular the words “international Airports” and “Domestic 
Airports” may be read as “International Terminals” and “Domestic Terminals” respectively. 
 
 
In para B (ii) in the last but one line the word “IB” is deleted. 
 
 
The full texts of amended paras are enclosed. 
 
 
All other points remain unchanged. 
 
(VEERANNA AIVELLI) 
Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
NO.CAS- 9 / (45) / 98-PIC  
Dated : 22.06.2000 
 
 
ANNEXURE 
 
(A) 
ENTRY TICKETS FOR VISITORS ONPAYMENT 
 
(i) 
The cost of each entry ticket will be Rs.50/- for International terminal and Rs.20/- 
for Domestic Terminal. 
 
(B) 
EMPORARY AIRPORT ENTRY PERMIT FOR LEGITIMATE OFFICIAL  
FUNCTIONS 
 
 
(i) 
There are occasions when establishment of special counters to facilitate reception f 
delegates etc is permitted by AAI.  For manning such counters special type of entry tickets / 
Temporary PIC at the rate of Rs. 500/-each per person per day will be issued by AAI on 
receipt of requisition from the concerned department / agency on the authorization of BCAS 
and where BCAS office is not there then discreet enquiry be made though local police by 
Airport Director.
